mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM user_withdraw uw left join user_info ui on uw.user_id = ui.id where
1=1

SELECT uw.*,ui.header,ui.nick_name FROM user_withdraw uw left join user_info ui on uw.user_id = ui.id where
1=1 order by create_date desc
